# Login form bypasses authentication - security issue

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-8](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-8/login-form-bypasses-authentication-security-issue)
**Priority:** No priority
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

**Bug Description:**
The login form does not actually authenticate users. It just waits 1 second and navigates to dashboard regardless of credentials entered.

**Location:** frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx (lines 22-35)

**Current Behavior:**

```typescript
await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000))
navigate("/dashboard")
```

**Expected Behavior:**

* Call backend auth API to validate credentials
* Store JWT token on successful login
* Redirect to login on 401 errors

**Priority:** Critical
